author: Shawna Chen
title: In photos: How Russia's attack is unfolding in Ukraine
description: Russia's large-scale invasion has already killed dozens of civilians in Ukraine.
content:
As Ukraine mobilizes to fight off Russian forces, Ukrainians are struggling to seek safety and rushing to evacuate under martial law.
